channel.title: Imvu
channel.description: I found a really kewl 3D Game/Chat room place! It's called IMVU Most people already know about it but guess what! When you sign up you get a free house with loads of furniture! You also get to change how your character looks! Wait, there's more! You can buy loads of kewl stuff like pets, clothes, rooms, scenes furniture and more with virtual credits! You can also customize your homepage to how you want it to look! You can hang out with your friends, or make new ones! You can beat the shit out of people that annoy you! You can swear! You can buy an access pass and fuck people(Have sex)! And last of all, it's FREE! To sign up, click here! [url=http://imvu.com/catalog/web_invitation.php?userId=12908305&from=power-email]http://imvu.com/catalog/web_invitation.php?userId=12908305&from=power-email[/url] When you sign up you get 1000 free credits! You also get 500 credits just for verifying your email! The big money maker is when you talk every day for 4 days in a row! You get 5000 CREDITS! You can keep doing this to earn loads of credits and buy things! I recently bought a tommy gun and killed all the people at my party! LOL WEll please join so that you can have fun!

item.title: Imvu
item.dc:creator: @fusionflamar fusionflamar
item.description:
@fusionflamar wrote:

I found a really kewl 3D Game/Chat room place!
It’s called IMVU
Most people already know about it but guess what!
When you sign up you get a free house with loads of furniture!
You also get to change how your character looks!
Wait, there’s more!
You can buy loads of kewl stuff like pets, clothes, rooms, scenes furniture and more with virtual credits!
You can also customize your homepage to how you want it to look!
You can hang out with your friends, or make new ones!
You can beat the shit out of people that annoy you!
You can swear!
You can buy an access pass and fuck people(Have sex)!
And last of all, it’s FREE!
To sign up, click here! http://imvu.com/catalog/web_invitation.php?userId=12908305&from=power-email
When you sign up you get 1000 free credits!
You also get 500 credits just for verifying your email!
The big money maker is when you talk every day for 4 days in a row!
You get 5000 CREDITS!
You can keep doing this to earn loads of credits and buy things!
I recently bought a tommy gun and killed all the people at my party! LOL
WEll please join so that you can have fun!

Read full topic
